sentences.en: He pasted the pictures into his scrapbook.
sentences.cn: 他把画片贴到他的剪贴本里。

sentences.en: When you're doing something important, like launching a big project, or running some sort of campaign designed to change things, keep a scrapbook.
sentences.cn: 当你在做些重要的事情时，例如启动一个大计划，或开展一项以改变为目的的运动，那就做一个剪贴簿。

sentences.en: Store your leaves in a scrapbook.
